title: Russian conscript goes on rampage at secret military base killing at least eight
text:

A Russian conscript went on the rampage at a secret military base in Siberia killing at least eight of his comrades.

Two others were badly wounded - but the first target is thought to have been an officer.

The alleged killer ran from the base causing panic in the nearby village.

Shops were closed and children sent home and kept indoors.

The suspect, named as Ramil Shamsutdinov, was detained in a joint police and army operation and immediately claimed he “didn’t regret anything”, according to reports.

In 2013 he was quoted as he attended a military training camp in Tyumen region, western Siberia.

(Image: East2west)

Military sources claimed the gunman had suffered "a nervous breakdown due to personal problems” but gave no further details.

The massacre was at the village of Gorny - closed to outsiders - in the sprawling Trans-Baikal region, six time zones east of Moscow.

Two officers and conscripts were among the dead.

The attack came as during a changing of the guard at the remote base.

“It all happened during change of guards,” said one source.

“Shamsutdinov took his gun and shot captain Evseev.

“Others immediately threw themselves on the ground, but he started shooting them.”

He then “finished them off”' with shots to their heads, according to Life Shot.

(Image: East2west)

(Image: East2west)

Seven people died at the site, one died later at hospital.

Two are were undergoing surgery for bullet wounds.

It is believed the base houses the 3rd missile brigade of the 29th Combined Arms Army of the Eastern Military District, formed in December 2016.

Among those killed were Captain Evseev, 30, Lieutenant Pyanov, 29, Private Nikitin, 21, Private Bogomolov, 20, Private Pokhitilo, 20, Private Kurokov, 21, and Private Andreev, 19, who is known to have died from gun wounds at hospital.

Two of the dead were conscript who had been due to leave the army today by train to go home, said reports. Mash news outlet earlier said that the soldier escaped to a nearby town causing panic.

But Life stated he never left the military unit.

One source said the detained “killer”served at military unit 54160 in Gorny which earlier belonged to Russian Air Force.

The shooting happened at a part of the military unit which was some way away from the closed village.
description: The gunman, Ramil Shamsutdinov, 20, also wounded two others in the shoot-out at the military base in Siberia
